languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, на мире Фолстоун конфликт между верующими Ордена Молота и беженцами из владений династии Винтерскейл. У склепа подвижника Никомедаса Кифы разразился спор, и в ходе потасовке склеп был поврежден. Пилигримы, почитающие соперника Кифы, Филопимена Мальпийского, утверждали, что Кифа — вор, расхищавший реликвии святого Когнация и тревоживший священную тайну его захоронения ради жажды наживы. Орден Молота в ярости от кощунственных заявлений и осквернения захоронения подвижника".

"Lord Captain, the world of Foulstone has been upset by a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domain. An argument broke out near the tomb of the renowned holy man Nicomedes Keefe, and the tomb was damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering Keefe's rival, Philopimenes of Malpi, claim Keefe to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and violated the sacred mystery of his resting place to sate his greed. The Order of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of Keefe's burial site."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, на мире Фолстоун конфликт между верующими Ордена Молота и беженцами из владений династии Винтерскейл. У склепа подвижника Никомедаса Кифы разразился спор, и в ходе потасовке склеп был поврежден. Пилигримы, почитающие соперника Кифы, Филопимена Мальпийского, утверждали, что Кифа — вор, расхищавший реликвии святого Когнация и тревоживший священную тайну его захоронения ради жажды наживы. traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, there is a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domains. An argument broke out near the tomb of the ascetic Nicomedas Cephas, and the tomb got damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering the Cephas's rival, Philopimenes of Malfi, have claimed Cephas to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and disturbing the sacrament of his resting place to sate his greed. The Orden of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of the ascetic's burial site."

languages.text: “舰长大人，重锤修会的追随者和来自温特斯凯尔领地的难民之间爆发了冲突。他们在苦行僧尼科梅迪斯·基弗的坟墓附近发生了争执，坟墓在这一过程中遭到了损坏。那些朝圣者们崇拜基弗的宿敌，马尔皮的菲洛匹厄斯。他们声称基弗是一个小偷，说基弗受到贪婪的诱惑，盗走了圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物，还扰乱了安息之地的圣礼。这些异端言论和对亵渎墓地的恶行让重锤修会非常愤怒。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domain. An argument broke out near the tomb of the ascetic Nicomedes Keefe, and the tomb was damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering Keefe's rival, Philopimenes of Malpi, claim Keefe to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and disturbed the sacrament of his resting place to sate his greed. The Order of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of the ascetic's burial site."

“舰长大人，重锤修会的追随者和来自温特斯凯尔领地的难民之间爆发了冲突。他们在苦行僧尼科米达斯·基弗的坟墓附近发生了争执，坟墓在这一过程中遭到了损坏。那些朝圣者们崇拜基弗的宿敌，马尔皮的菲洛匹厄斯。他们声称基弗是一个小偷，说基弗受到贪婪的诱惑，盗走了圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物，还扰乱了安息之地的圣礼。这些异端言论和对亵渎墓地的恶行让重锤修会非常愤怒。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hay un conflicto entre los seguidores de la Orden del Martillo y los refugiados de los dominios de la dinastía Winterscale. Una pelea estalló cerca de la tumba del asceta Nicomedas Cefas, y la tumba resultó dañada en la refriega. Los peregrinos que veneran al rival de Cefas, Filopimenes de Malpi, afirman que Cefas es un ladrón que había robado las reliquias de san Cognatius y perturbado el sacramento de su lugar de descanso para saciar su codicia. La Orden del Martillo está enfurecida por las declaraciones heréticas y la profanación del lugar de enterramiento del asceta».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domain. An argument broke out near the tomb of the ascetic Nicomedas Cephas, and the tomb was damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering Cephas's rival, Philopimenes of Malpi, claim Cephas to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and disturbed the sacrament of his resting place to sate his greed. The Orden of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of the ascetic's burial site."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hay un conflicto entre los seguidores de la Orden del Martillo y los refugiados de los dominios de la dinastía Winterscale. Los peregrinos que veneran al rival de Cefas, Filopimenes de Malpi, afirman que Cefas es un ladrón que había robado las reliquias de san Cognatius y perturbado el sacramento de su lugar de descanso para saciar su codicia. La Orden del Martillo está enfurecida por las declaraciones heréticas y la profanación del lugar de enterramiento del asceta».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、鉄槌の修道会の信者とウィンタースケール王朝の領地出身の難民との間で紛争が起きています。修道士ニコメダス・セファスの墓の近くで口論が起こり、その争いで墓が破損しました。セファと敵対関係であるマルピのフィロピメーネスを崇める巡礼者は、セファが聖コグナティウスの聖遺物を盗み、欲望を満たそうとその安息地の秘跡を乱したと主張しています。そのため、鉄槌の修道会は、異端的な発言と修道士の埋葬地を冒涜したことに激怒しているのです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domain. An argument broke out near the tomb of the ascetic Nicomedas Cephas, and the tomb was damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering Cephas's rival, Philopimenes of Malpi, claim Cephas to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and disturbed the sacrament of his resting place to sate his greed. The Orden of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of the ascetic's burial site."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les adeptes de l'Ordre du Marteau et les réfugiés du domaine de la dynastie Winterscale sont en conflit. Une échauffourée a éclaté près de la tombe de l'ascète Nicomédas Céphas, et le lieu saint a été endommagé. Les pèlerins vénèrent le rival de Céphas, Philopimène de Malpi, et prétendent que le premier est un voleur, qui a dérobé les reliques de Saint Cognatius et violé le caractère sacré de sa sépulture afin d'assouvir sa seule cupidité. Ces déclarations hérétiques et la profanation du tombeau de l'ascète ont provoqué l'ire de l'Ordre du Marteau. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domain. An argument broke out near the tomb of the ascetic Nicomedas Cephas, and the tomb was damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering Cephas's rival, Philopimenes of Malpi, claim Cephas to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and disturbed the sacrament of his resting place to sate his greed. The Orden of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of the ascetic's burial site."

Ces déclarations hérétiques et la profanation du tombeau de l'ascète ont provoqué l'ire de l'Ordre du Marteau. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, es besteht ein Konflikt zwischen den Anhängern des Ordens des Hammers und den Flüchtlingen aus dem Reich der Winterzunder-Dynastie. In der Nähe des Grabs des Asketen Nicomedas Cephas ist ein Streit ausgebrochen, in dessen Verlauf das Grab beschädigt wurde. Die Pilger, die Cephas' Rivalen Philopimenes von Malpi verehren, halten Cephas für einen Dieb, der die Reliquien des Heiligen Cognatius gestohlen hat. Sie sagen, er habe das Sakrament von Cognatius' Ruhestätte gestört, nur um sich zu bereichern. Der Orden des Hammers ist erzürnt über diese ketzerischen Behauptungen und die Entweihung der Grabstätte des Asketen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domain. An argument broke out near the tomb of the ascetic Nicomedas Cephas, and the tomb was damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering Cephas's rival, Philopimenes of Malpi, claim Cephas to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and disturbed the sacrament of his resting place to sate his greed. The Orden of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of the ascetic's burial site."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, es besteht ein Konflikt zwischen den Anhängern des Ordens des Hammers und den Flüchtlingen aus dem Reich der Winterzunder-Dynastie. Der Orden des Hammers ist erzürnt über diese ketzerischen Behauptungen und die Entweihung der Grabstätte des Asketen."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Çekiç Tarikatı müritleri ile Winterscale hanedanlığının topraklarından gelen mülteciler arasında bir anlaşmazlık çıktı. Çileci Nicomedes Keefe'nin kabrinin yakınlarında bir tartışma patlak verdi ve mücadele esnasında kabir hasar gördü. Keefe'nin rakibi Malpili Philopimenes'i ilah olarak gören Hacılar, Keefe'nin Aziz Cognatius'un yadigârlarını çalan bir hırsız olduğunu ve tamahkârlığını doyurmak adına kabrinin kutsallığına zarar verdiğini iddia ediyorlar. Çekiç Tarikatı, kâfirce iddialar ve çilecinin kabristanına gösterilen hürmetsizlik karşısında öfkeden deliye dönmüş hâlde."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is a conflict between the followers of the Order of the Hammer and the refugees from the Winterscale dynasty's domain. An argument broke out near the tomb of the ascetic Nicomedes Keefe, and the tomb was damaged in the fray. The pilgrims revering Keefe's rival, Philopimenes of Malpi, claim Keefe to be a thief who had stolen the relics of Saint Cognatius and disturbed the sacrament of his resting place to sate his greed. The Order of the Hammer is furious at the heretical statements and the desecration of the ascetic's burial site."
